show.subtitle: Mickey Huff is co-host of the Project Censored Show with former Project Censored director Dr. Peter Phillips. It airs on the progressiveradionetwork.com out of New York City
show.title: Project Censored

title: Project Censored
content:
Peter Phillips and Andy Roth preview on the most important news stories not covered by the corporate media in 2012-13... <!--more--> from the soon to be released Censored 2014 yearbook.
Additionally, they play segments of the award winning documentary Project Censored the Movieâ€”Ending the Reign of Junk Food News, which just won the award for best directors at the Madrid International Film festival in July.
